references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundation for many of the text-to-image diffusion models discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP is introduced in this paper, providing a way to align text and images which is highly relevant to the task of aligning text-to-image diffusion models with human preferences.

references.paper_title: Advances in prospect theory: Cumulative representation of uncertainty
references.reason: This paper introduces prospect theory, a behavioral economic model that is used to formulate the utility maximization objective in the target paper's proposed method.

references.paper_title: Kto: Model alignment as prospect theoretic optimization
references.reason: KTO, introduced in this paper, is the foundation upon which the target paper's novel method, Diffusion-KTO, is built, extending the utility maximization framework to diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Diffusion model alignment using direct preference optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces Diffusion-DPO, a related method for aligning diffusion models which uses direct preference optimization and serves as a key comparison point for the target paper's approach.
